title: Deaths per day in West African countries with 2014 Ebola outbreak by disease
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Diseases, and Number of deaths per day in each Diseases on the y axis.
The Number of deaths per day is highest at Diseases HIV/AIDS and lowest at Diseases Ebola.
The difference of Number of deaths per day between the highest and lowest Diseases is 681.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Diseases in the x axis and Number of deaths per day in the y axis.
The maximum Number of deaths per day 685.0 is found at Diseases HIV/AIDS and the minimum is found at Ebola where Diseases is 4.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Diseases, and Number of deaths per day in each Diseases on the y axis.
The Number of deaths per day is highest at Diseases HIV/AIDS and lowest at Diseases Ebola.
The difference of Number of deaths per day between the highest and lowest Diseases is 681.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of deaths per day for 6 number of Diseasess.
The Number of deaths per day is appeared to be the highest at Diseases HIV/AIDS and lowest at Diseases Ebola.
Second maximum Number of deaths per day is found at Diseases Malaria.
The minimum Diseases Ebola has got 171.25 times less Number of deaths per day than the maximum Diseases HIV/AIDS.
Diseases HIV/AIDS is higher than any other Diseasess with value 685.0, followed by Malaria, and Diarrhoea. Down to Diseases Ebola with the lowest value 4.0.
The Diseases HIV/AIDS has 2.32 times more Number of deaths per day than average.
The Number of deaths per day is 1769.0 if we add up values of all Diseasess.
